blog.name: codeflaws
blog.title: spare parts man ⎊
blog.description:
anthony (tony, tonio) | 22 | he/him | ENTP

STARKERS DONT INTERACT

||stevetony, winteriron, rhfe||

⚙️🔧COMMISSIONS ARE OPEN🔧⚙️

summary:
reminder: tony stark 
is always right 
is the best avenger 
was right in civil war
is beautiful 
is a genius
is not threatened...
body:
reminder: tony stark

  • is always right
  • is the best avenger
  • was right in civil war
  • is beautiful
  • is a genius
  • is not threatened by and only encourages other geniuses/is proud and happy when people are smarter than him
  • loves robots and AIs
  • respects women
  • immediately shut down weapons manufacturing and became more involved with his company when he saw the damage it was creating
  • would never have permitted double dealing under the table which is exactly why Obadiah Stane hid it from him and tried to kill him 3 times
  • never treated bruce banner like an unstable monster and was in awe of his scientific achievements the first time they met/was never wary and befriended him
  • flew a nuke into space without any hesitation and nearly died to save new york
  • redeemed himself a million times over
  • has ptsd and anxiety
  • was canonically abused by his father, howard stark, physically and mentally as well as through neglect
  • was not wrong for reacting angrily to watching his parents’ brutal murder on tape and then finding out a friend he’d been sticking his neck out for knew for years
  • didnt actually attempt to kill bucky or steve bc if he really wanted to, he couldve used any of the advanced weaponry within his suit
  • owns up to his mistakes and learns from them
  • strives to be better
  • would die for the whole world without hesitation if it meant everyone’s safety
  • fought thanos alone the longest and made him bleed
  • believes in and fights for the future
  • loves his family and friends and would do anything for them
  • will be an amazing father (and is already an amazing father-figure to Peter Parker)
  • is earth’s best defender
  • is a hero

blog.name: drabblesinthemoonlight
blog.title: Dancing In The Moonlight
blog.description: Out of order Winteriron and Ironwidow drabbles. An amateur female!Toni enthusiast and writer.

title: Chapter Six
body:
“You are going absolutely to love this Nat,” Toni assures.

The TARDIS is almost in sight, it’s hidden inside an alley.

“I don’t love anything,” Natasha mutters to herself.

“You don’t mean that do you?” Toni asks stupidly.

And behold the truth of the statement because Natasha absolutely does.

“To love is a weakness.”  

Oh, okay then.

Thankfully, there stands the TARDIS in its unassuming but technological glory. Toni is thus saved from any stifling silence.  

“Well, here it is!” Toni blurts.

Natasha gives no outward acknowledgment aside from a nod.

“It’s called the TARDIS,” Toni adds.

Natasha grunts in response.

“Actually, I have another friend. And I mean I already told him you were coming but I didn’t tell you he was there and that was probably a bad move but uh…” Toni trails off.

With how suspicious Toni is acting, she’s surprised she hasn’t been strung up by her ankles yet.  

“Do…do you want to go in?” Toni asks.

“I don’t see how this proves anything you’ve said true.” Natasha criticizes.

Whoop, there it is.  

“I could bring him out if you want?” Toni offers.

“That isn’t any comfort. You haven’t even told me your name, all you know is something like mine.”

Toni knew she had forgotten something.

“Antonia,” Toni said, “but ‘Toni’ works just fine.”

“And Antonia, how do you know my name?” Natasha prompts stiffly.

It is very professional, Toni is unnerved. It’s like meeting Natasha all over again. Which is not untrue.

“Well, the short answer is I know you! We’re friends!” Toni tries.

Natasha rolls her eyes, again. Was Toni like this as a teenager?

Answer: highly probable.

Most accurate answer: absolutely.

“Later on, you get out of here. You’re safe, we meet, you stab me in the neck–”

That catches her attention.

“–which while intentional was not. Lethal.”

Then she looks very put off.

“If I’m such a problem, why not just kill me as a baby? Why not prevent –” Natasha falters, “Why not stop me from going there in the first place.”

Toni’s at a loss for a moment. The reasons are there, have been ever since Toni started planning what she could do to fix things.

Toni goes with the blunt explanation.

“If I went too far back they’d choose someone else.”

“What,” Natasha asks flatly.

“You heard what I said.”

“I thought you said we were friends?! Wouldn’t you just put me out of my misery!” Natasha screams. “I – things I had to do! To survive in there!”  

“I know–”

“No, you don’t! If you did! You would’ve!” Natasha chokes out.

“They would’ve used someone else, Tasha! Someone–” and Toni feels guilty saying it, “–weaker.”

“No! I’m…I’m the weak one! I gave in and I–”

“You ran, you stopped, you cut the strings, Tasha!” Toni tries to point out.

“I was a coward!”

“You survived! You did what…what you had to.”  

“I didn’t want to,” Natasha says quietly.

“You shouldn’t have had to.”

Toni and Natasha’s faces are both blotchy. Toni doesn’t know where to go from here. Comfort would usually be the right move, but with Natasha, she doesn’t… Natasha jerks when Toni hugs her, she clings to Toni. When Natasha starts shaking Toni doesn’t say anything about it.

  “Just tell me one more thing?” Natasha asks.

“What do you need to know?” Toni asks softly.

“Do I keep the strings cut?”

The silence presses in on all sides. The smell of the alley seems to increase, or Toni’s more aware of it anyway.  

“Toni?” Natasha pleads.

“Yes,” Toni lies.

“You hesitated,” Natasha points out.

She sounds terrified.

“I’ll make sure they stay cut.”

“You lied.”

“Natasha.”  

“When you–” Toni clears her throat, “–If you feel like something, someone, is watching and they’re coming for your throat, come to me.”

“That doesn’t answer my question.”

“That’s because I don’t know what else to tell you.”

Natasha doesn’t respond. Toni waits. Then Natasha pulls away.

“I’ll come with you,” Natasha asserts.

Her words are hollow.  

“Nat–”

“You have what you want. Let’s go,” Natasha snaps.

Toni can’t argue.

blog.title: Welcome to my personal hell
blog.description: Basically I'll post here everything I want and I don't care if you don't like it.

summary: I don't care what the others say!
title: I don't care what the others say!
body:
Words: 679

Relationship: Tony Stark x skinny!Reader

Warning: Fluffy, midia bullying.

Summary: Basically Tony and you had a relationship. You are a writer and Tony, well… He is Tony Stark. But the media, especially the gossip channels, are keeping getting heavy with you, with your relationship, since you’re skinny.

“It’s hard to imagine, even me, that the most dreamy playboy of women is dating her. Really, (y/n) (y/l/n) may even be a good writer, but the appearance leaves something to be desired.” said the woman on TV.

(y/n) sighed audibly as she continued to hear the masked insults of the hostess. She knew about Tony’s lady before she even met him. A gunmaker, womanizer and playboy. Of course most of the time it was the Iron Man and it was because of his work as a hero that they met.

She was in a coffee bar when the alien invasion happened. She lost all the novel she was writing when her notebook was destroyed in a fight between the Iron Man and a Chitauri, but she didn’t care, since he had saved her life by preventing that strange thing from attacking her.

They reunite shortly afterward with the billionaire’s appearance at his door with a new notebook and a funny smile, inviting her to a coffee shop. (y/n) refused, of course. Why the famous Tony Stark, would you want to date someone like her? A skinny woman who barely has curves and her only attraction was the books she wrote.

Tony didn’t stop inviting her until (y/n) accepted, which only happened because she thought he wanted her to write a biography of him or something, after all everyone knew just how narcissistic Tony Stark could be.

But he flirted with (y/n) whenever he met her, whether it was a social event her publisher forced her to go to, or just when Tony pretended to be a casual date on the market. It wasn’t long before the media speculated and began to talk about how disproportionate the combination was. Tony kept saying he shouldn’t mind, he asked her on a date as proof of what he felt and every day he did a thing or two to prove how much he liked her and that made (y/n) happy, at least while the TV was off.

“Many speculate that this alleged relationship between the two was a marketing strategy for the sale of (y/n)’s books to start selling, since before it seemed not to be so successful…” the woman said wickedly on the television. “Mute.” the television continued with video, but without audio after receiving the command of Tony.

(y/n) didn’t even move, she knew he was behind her scolding her with his gaze locked on the back of her neck. (y/n) blushed as Tony sat next to her and continued to stare.

“Are you a masochist?” Tony asked, getting a look of strangeness from his girlfriend. “Because it looks like you’ve been watching this show.”

"I’m not a masochist.” It was the only thing (y/n) could answer.

”(y/n), you understand once and for all.” He stepped closer and gripped her girlfriend’s thin face. “I love you just the way you are, I don’t care if you’re taller or shorter, leaner or fatter. For me you are beautiful, wonderful and delicious. Inside and outside. And I don’t care what the others say! You’re the woman I love!”

(y/n) was already with tears in her eyes ready to drip, but Tony wouldn’t let them leave, kissing her eyes and hugging her next.

“Ignore the media! What matters is the two of us!” Tony took (y/n) off the couch with ease and put his girlfriend in his lap, hugging her affectionately. "Stop paying attention to them and pay attention to me.”

"I say the same for you and your armor.” (y/n) smirked and he pretended to be misunderstood.

“I don’t know what you’re talking about.” They both laughed and (y/n) filled him with kisses.

“I love you, Tin Man.” He grimaced at the nickname, but then gave him a badge.

“I love you, Rowling.” He replied and it was (y/n)’s turn to grimace. She hated being compared to other writers, as much as she was Rowling’s fan.

Summary: Basically Tony and you had a relationship. You are a writer and Tony, well… He is Tony Stark. But the media, especially the gossip channels, are keeping getting heavy with you, with your relationship, since you’re skinny.

“It’s hard to imagine, even me, that the most dreamy playboy of women is dating her. Really, (y/n) (y/l/n) may even be a good writer, but the appearance leaves something to be desired.” said the woman on TV.

(y/n) sighed audibly as she continued to hear the masked insults of the hostess. She knew about Tony’s lady before she even met him. A gunmaker, womanizer and playboy. Of course most of the time it was the Iron Man and it was because of his work as a hero that they met.

She was in a coffee bar when the alien invasion happened. She lost all the novel she was writing when her notebook was destroyed in a fight between the Iron Man and a Chitauri, but she didn’t care, since he had saved her life by preventing that strange thing from attacking her.

They reunite shortly afterward with the billionaire’s appearance at his door with a new notebook and a funny smile, inviting her to a coffee shop. (y/n) refused, of course. Why the famous Tony Stark, would you want to date someone like her? A skinny woman who barely has curves and her only attraction was the books she wrote.

Warning: I have a peculiar sense of humor, read at your own risks. 
(multifandom)
I don't own any of the fics here, and I try to always put the source in the post (if I miss one please don't hesitate to contact me so I can fix it)

summary: “No, I’ll do it,” Steve says. “Team leader. That and you’re busy getting the place actually functional.” “It’s not being busy...
body:
“No, I’ll do it,” Steve says. “Team leader. That and you’re busy getting the place actually functional.”

“It’s not being busy when you like doing it,” Tony says.

“I know,” Steve says. “Saving the world’s number one.”

Tony peers at Steve over the rims of his glasses. “Gotta watch out there, Steve. If you’re not careful, you’re going to be stuck with me.”

True to fashion, Steve completely surprises Tony by looking him right in the eye and declaring with heartrending intensity, “Good.”

Source

blog.description: cherie. tony stark, iron fam on main. girls and movies [tracking: #usercherie] I make gifs. I protect tony stark

summary: Hi Cherie, hope you're having good time this holiday season :) Allow me to share a new, happy idea in my fave Tony/Peggy...
question: Hi Cherie, hope you're having good time this holiday season :) Allow me to share a new, happy idea in my fave Tony/Peggy dynamic. Tony the healthy food freak being exasperated with his beloved aunt's awful eating habits. He invites her for lunch, there's all these salads and fish and green smoothies and Peggy goes straight for a huge steak and baked potatoes, and a heavy sauce, lots of red wine thank you please.
answer:
Justine you know I love alllll the Aunt Peggy and Tony headcanons you’re so good to me I LOVE YOU you’re the best :’))

And I can totally picture it lmaoo

Tony being half offended half amused by his dear aunt choice of food, he’s like, ‘Aunt Peg I’m not saying vegetarianism is the only way forward but you should incorporate it in your diet…’

‘Hush Anthony! Not in front of my steak!’ Mmmmm and she takes a big gulp of the wine.

Tony winces in sympathy for her digestive system and cholesterol level..

‘You’re not 40 anymore and you don’t exercise half as much, you don’t need all those proteins and fat in your system, I’m just worried about your blood pressure level my dearly beloved auntie’

‘Excuse you young man, how dare you remind a lady of her age! Where are your manners?’ Peggy says as she continues to devour the steak in front of her

‘Forgive me Aunt Peg, you’re still fit as a fiddle, I just want it to be kept that way.’ Tony uses his sweetest boy charm smile and put some salad and green leaves on Peggy’s plate, Peggy couldn’t resist him when he smiles so sweetly like this and he knows it, she just rolls her eyes and accept the greens.

‘Please, for me, Aunt Peg.’ Then he utilises his highly weaponised bambi brown eyes as he pushes the smoothie towards her, Peggy sighs in defeat and grumbly puts down her steak, takes a big sip of the smoothie while making a face to show her displeasure, she drinks it nonetheless. 

‘The things I do for you Anthony, only you…’ She then goes back to her steak but she’s eating it slower now, and every now and then she eats it with the greens, and now she’s also abandoned the red wine because gross as it looks, the green smoothie is actually really tasty and refreshing. 

‘I love you too Aunt Peg,’ Tony chuckles with his eyes filled with adoration, he has the cutest auntie in the world, and she’s the best even her diet is still worrying.

blog.name: viva-la-idiots
blog.title: Willshaper Yeet
blog.description: Willshaper // play nice kiddos // send me something im bored

title: Wanda MCU
body:
sometimes i realize we all love Wanda wayyy too little. Her entire life she’s endured torture with the totality to drive someone insane. She was abused for her uniqueness and forced to make her powers beneficial for others to be a weapon of mass destruction. Her “special/safe person” was her brother, but he died for the very people she saw every single day after joining the Avengers. ever, single time she sees Clint (or any Avenger) she must remember his death. Then she falls in love with a robot guy, and to be fair he is lit. He is the sum of all humanity, Tony Stark’s knowledge, innovation, Jarvis, and an infinity stone. She has the ability to match that in a HEALTHY relationship, despite her past. Then she is able to DESTROY an infinity stone, meaning she MATCHES its power. AND THEN she looses her boyfriend. 

And y’all mad that she didn’t just do away with Vision real quick to solve things. But if Steve had to kill off Bucky to secure a stone, would y’all be ok with that? No. 

Because he’s a “real” person you all love. But heres the tea, Vision was real to Wanda and we didn’t love him as much because he was lw under developed. But you know who did love him? Wanda (and prolly Tony and the other Avengers). 

So. Guys, we failed her. We failed to appreciate her. And she’s dusted so…
